titleStmt.title: Manuductio or, a leading of children by the hand through the principles of grammar. / By Ja: Shirley.
titleStmt.author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Lowndes, at the White-Lion in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "febr: 1659"; the "60" in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the White-Lion in S. Pauls Church-yard
